definition: to undertake advanced studies/to take a refresher course
to go forward/to advance/to go in/to enter/to put in/to submit/to take in/to admit/(math.) base of a number system/classifier for sections in a building or residential compound
dried meat/private teacher's remuneration/withered/variant of 修[xiu1]
surname Xiu
to decorate/to embellish/to repair/to build/to write/to cultivate/to study/to take (a class)

sentences.english: Well, for grad school, I'm probably going to go to Portland.
sentences.chinese: 对于进修的学校，我可能回去波特兰。

sentences.english: If I don't pan out as a salesman, I can still go back to school.
sentences.chinese: 如果我不能做一名成功的销售，我还可以回学校进修。

sentences.english: I cannot solve this math problem.
sentences.chinese: 我解没有开那讲数进修题。

sentences.english: The continuing education system for teachers was first established by Buddha Shakyamuni.
sentences.chinese: 教师进修的制度是释迦牟尼佛首创的。

sentences.english: Only one CE cash coupon can be used for one CE program.
sentences.chinese: 每张CE现金券只可用于一个持续进修课程。

sentences.english: Reading room for teachers and students.
sentences.chinese: “乳源教师进修学校”师生阅览室。

sentences.english: I would like to take English courses for the government employees to improve my English ability.
sentences.chinese: 我想参加公教人员英语进修班来改善我的英语能力。

sentences.english: Application forms are now available at the College Dean of Students' Office.
sentences.chinese: 进修计划申请表格可到书院辅导处索取。

sentences.english: Had graduated from Beijing film academy in America for study after fine.
sentences.chinese: 曾毕业于北京电影学院美术系，后赴美国进修。

sentences.english: A really excellent teacher needs to spend time learning.
sentences.chinese: 一个实正优良的教员须要花时间进修。

sentences.english: Bs output and release, speaking and writing function as feedback-based learning.
sentences.chinese: 说和写，是输出和释放，也可以说是基于反馈的进修。

sentences.english: Independent thinking is a precise necessity in study.
sentences.chinese: 独立忖量对进修是一概必需的。

sentences.english: They should be given more opportunities for mid-career studies.
sentences.chinese: 他们应当有更多的脱产进修的机会。

sentences.english: Learning meant everything to my rich dad.
sentences.chinese: 而对于富爸爸来说，进修才是一切。

sentences.english: As aresult, it is impossible to devote enough time and energy in their study and job.
sentences.chinese: 是以，他们不有可能有足够的时间用于进修或事情。

sentences.english: Interest in retaining the Chinese language is growing among Chinese-Canadians.
sentences.chinese: 越来越多的加拿大华裔渴望进修中文。

definition: to pursue one's studies
to major (in a field)/to study a specialty to obtain a higher degree
master's degree
to do research work/to engage in advanced studies
graduation/to graduate/to finish school
to pass an entrance exam/to be admitted to
to study under (a teacher)
to pass entrance exam/to enter college after a competitive exam
doctoral degree/PhD/same as Doctor of Philosophy 哲學博士學位|哲学博士学位
to hold a teaching position
to finish school, esp. a short course/to complete a course
master's degree/person who has a master's degree/learned person
bachelor's degree
graduate student/postgraduate student/research student
to join the faculty of one's alma mater upon graduation/to remain at school during vacation
to gain entry by passing an exam/to be admitted to (a college etc)
